item.title: Getting started with Python (Beginner's Tutorial)
item.description: Getting Started # Hi, In this tutorial you will how to get started with Python. You will go through python installation and some basics of python. But firstly, what is python. Python is a high-level, interpreted, general-purpose programming language. Its design philosophy emphasizes code readability with the use of significant indentation. Python is dynamically-typed and garbage-collected. Dynamically Typed - These are languages which assign the data type to a variable at runtime based on their value.
